>
[Climbing Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=1258) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.
name: Climbing Claws
